attributes.action: Sack Professor Ian Kennedy as the chair of the new parliamentary Standards Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned have decided that Ian Kennedy is NOT prepared to implement al recommendations made in the report regarding the MP's scandal. In addition he is a Labour party crony and therefore has a direct conflict of interest. He is anti democratic and therefore anti the public and tax-payers interest.
